keywords.value: Serbian Orthodox Cathedral of St Sava (Manhattan, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Despite reports that the city had ordered the ruins to be taken down, the Buildings Department said the investigation of the structure, which has landmark status, was not finished.

headline.print_headline: New York Serbian Church Gutted by Fire Won’t Be Demolished, for Now
headline.main: New York Serbian Church Gutted by Fire Won’t Be Demolished, for Now

snippet: Despite reports that the city had ordered the ruins to be taken down, the Buildings Department said the investigation of the structure, which has landmark status, was not finished.
abstract: Landmark Serbian Orthodox Cathedral of St Sava in Manhattan, which was ravaged by fire in May, leaving only shell, will be allowed to stand while Buildings Dept determines whether remaining structure might be saved.
